Welcome to KASC Hall! This is unofficial application. This app is made for all the Faculty to book hall for their events in college .If this application could help you by any means, please do share it with Other 🤞 Address :GN Mills, Coimbatore - 641029. Tamil Nadu, INDIA Phone : +914222642095/ +914222642236/ +914222646588 250 acres of sprawling lush green Campus strategically located on the GN Mills – Coimbatore, the two cleanest cities in the country CALTech – Collaborative and Active Learning through Technology faculty and pace to Book hall Sophisticated laboratories actively engage students in acquiring practical knowledge of industrial standards https://www.kongunaducollege.ac.in/
